text: There is a essential difference between the Logger's  removeAppender and removeAllAppenders methods. The first one only removes the appender from the logger while the second one also closes it. I suggest renaming the second one to smth like removeAndCloseAllAppenders, because right now it may cause some confusion (at least it did for me)
